price: مگر آنچه را که الله بخواهد؛ همانا او آشکار و نهان را می‌داند.
arabic: إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ يَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡجَهۡرَ وَمَا يَخۡفَىٰ

version.title: Persian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Persian by the team of the Persian language in Rowwad Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: illā mā shāa al-lahu innahu yaʿlamu al-jahra wamā yakhfā
